DOC.detailed_description: 1.2.1 Primary Secondary Outcome Measures Primary outcome : 1 ) Opiate positive urine test ; 2 ) HIV inject risk . Secondary outcome : 1 ) Time relapse ; 2 ) HIV sex risk ; 3 ) Proportion appointment keep ; 6 ) Psychiatric symptom ; 7 ) Opioid craving ; 8 ) Self-reported drug use ; 9 ) Money spent drug ; 10 ) Employment ; 11 ) Arrests ; 12 ) Overall adjustment ; 12 ) Adverse event . Hypotheses : 1 . Primary outcome significantly favor 48-week Vivitrol condition ; 2 . Five secondary outcome favor 48-week condition ; none favor 24-week condition .
